name: Professional Theatre
description:
Professional Theatre is colourful diorama of the world of Commedia dell'arte. Explore the piazza, find each mask and met the cast!

  • 6 masks to find and wear
  • Unique dialogue from each character depending on what mask you wear
  • Find the masks on your own or with the help of NPCs

Controls:

KeyboardXbox Controller MoveWASD Left JoystickInteractEAJumpSPACE / YYMenuEscStart
Select (menus)EnterA
